Hi!

Do you know if OAR is DRMAA compatible? To integrate it into our system we'd need the name reported by the python DRMAA module.

A quick way to check after installing DRMAA and the python DRMAA library ( https://pypi.python.org/pypi/drmaa ) would be to run the following commands at a python prompt:

import drmaa
s = drmaa.Session()
s.initialize()
s.drmsInfo

In the case of our own Sun Grid Engine it output:
u'OGS/GE 2011.11'

We would need that string (for OAR) as a start to identify the DRMS you're using. 

Also we do not have an OAR system to test on. We'd be more than happy to provide development support for an OAR driver. However first we'd need to make sure DRMAA works with OAR.

- Eric
